**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Rubus spectabilis</b></i>, the <b>salmonberry</b>, is a species of bramble in the rose family Rosaceae, native to the west coast of North America from west-central Alaska to California, inland as far as Idaho. Like many other species in the genus <i>Rubus</i>, the salmonberry plant bears edible fruit, typically yellow-orange or red in color, resembling raspberries in appearance.
